name: get-epsg-code
description: Gets EPSG Code for Various Inputs (incl. OGC WKT, ESRI WKT, GML, Mapfile, PROJ String, Proj4js String, XML)

scripts.build: npm run build:node && npm run build:web
scripts.build:demo: npm run build:web && cp dist/get-epsg-code-all.web.min.js demo/.
scripts.build:everything: if [ -d dist ]; then rm -Rf dist; fi && HASHED_FIELDS='' EXCLUDED_FORMATS='' npm run build && HASHED_FIELDS='esriwkt' EXCLUDED_FORMATS='' npm run build && HASHED_FIELDS='esriwkt,proj4' EXCLUDED_FORMATS='' npm run build && EXCLUDED_FORMATS='gml,xml' HASHED_FIELDS='esriwkt' npm run build && npm run create-build-list
scripts.build:everything:node: if [ -d dist ]; then rm -Rf dist; fi &&  HASHED_FIELDS='' EXCLUDED_FORMATS='' npm run build:node && HASHED_FIELDS='' EXCLUDED_FORMATS='' npm run build:node && HASHED_FIELDS='esriwkt' EXCLUDED_FORMATS='' npm run build:node && HASHED_FIELDS='esriwkt,proj4' EXCLUDED_FORMATS='' npm run build:node && EXCLUDED_FORMATS='gml,xml' HASHED_FIELDS='esriwkt' npm run build:node
scripts.demo: npm run build:demo && cd demo && http-server
scripts.test:everything:node: set -e; npm run build:everything:node && TEST_BUNDLES="$(ls ./dist | grep node.min.js$)"; for TEST_BUNDLE in $TEST_BUNDLES; do echo "TEST_BUNDLE: $TEST_BUNDLE" && TEST_BUNDLE=$TEST_BUNDLE npm run test:quick; done
scripts.update-docs: npm run test && npm run build:everything && npm run create-build-list

author: Daniel J. Dufour
